title: Pricing Items
full_text:
Pricing Items

Description
It may be hard figuring out what to price an item, for example, you just got back to the Citadel after some PVE grinding, you happen to have a Hybrid Claymore Blueprint, but you don't know what its worth, this is what this article could help you with.
Tips

1: Compare your price to market buy and sell price
Try find a middle ground between profit and customer satisfaction, for example, the market buy price is 1,000 the sell price is 500, so to be the most fair, you would sell it for 750
2: Get feedback from other players
